description:
Alexander was waiting tables at a restaurant when a friend spotted him. He had the Big Tough Guy look going, and my buddy was a bit intimidated to ask him to come pose for me. He finally got up the nerve and it turned out that Alexander couldn't have been nicer.
He has a relaxed attitude about sex (with both boys and girls). He likes to surf every chance he can, and is currently in "girl-mode", but as he says, he has spent some quality time with guys as well.
Alexander was one of those models that came in to do photos, and after finding out that I do video, he quickly volunteered to show off his stuff at 30 frames per second.
His shaved head and completely natural body hair are the highlights on this guy. I have to say though, his eyes are about as translucent as I have ever seen. I tried hard to capture his eyes, but I think my direction was a little off as I guided him through the intense face shots. He looks a bit surprised (and vampiric!) in some..but dang, those eyes are amazing! Would love to work with him again..even if it is non-nude stuff. He definitely has an awesome look and his video is top notch.
title: Alexander - Solo
